timeline.message:
Update Elasticsearch client version to latest

Signed-off-by: Gao Hongtao <hanahmily@gmail.com>

Add HealthChecker helper

Signed-off-by: Gao Hongtao <hanahmily@gmail.com>

Revert "Update Elasticsearch client version to latest"

This reverts commit f45a1276
Merge branch 'storage-elasticsearch-health' of github.com:apache/skywalking into storage-elasticsearch-health

Add health check to elasticsearch7

Signed-off-by: Gao Hongtao <hanahmily@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: CoreModule has depended on TelemetryModule, I think.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText:
Why need HealthChecker as a kind of util? And keep in static final(DEFAULT_CHECKER)?
According to #5046, Health check is a module/provider. So, the thing about the checker should be a service, which you could get a reference from ServiceManager in any module.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

+import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
+
+/**
+ * HealthChecker could provide health status to the listener.
+ */
+@Slf4j
+@RequiredArgsConstructor
+public class HealthChecker {

replies.bodyText:
Also, based on the way you use this, it is likely, you should have this module up and running always.
I think we need a little more discussion about health checker model behavior.
replies.author: wu-sheng
